_note._comment: This JSON file contains the paths to the manifest files required for the registration process.
_note._TODO: Replace this with your own manifests for the registration.
_note.genomics_manifest: Required: Path to the genomics manifest CSV file. Example manifest: 'templates/genomicsManifest_template.csv'
_note.sample_manifest: Required: Path to the sample manifest CSV file. Example manifest: 'templates/sampleManifest_template.csv'
_note.hash_manifest: Required: Path to the hash report CSV file. Example manifest: 'templates/hashReport_template.csv'
_note.mapping_manifest: Optional: Path to the mapping JSON file. Default is 'ingest_mapping.json' if not provided.
